entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of light snow near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of light snow early in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
